Zafrani Pulao
Rice Recipes: A sweet preparation made with basmati rice, nuts, saffron, milk and cream.
https://www.ndtv.com/cooks/images/Zaffrani-Pulao_article.jpg

A sweet preparation made with Basmati rice, nuts, saffron, milk and cream. Basmati rice is cooked well in saffron, nuts and cardamom. Laced with a mix of sugar and milk, this pulao is amazing delicious.
Brown Basmati Rice Pilaf
Rice Recipes: For the diet conscious, a healthy recipe with brown rice, olive oil, broccoli and plums.
https://www.ndtv.com/cooks/images/brown-rice-pilaf_large.jpg
For the diet conscious, a healthy recipe with brown rice, olive oil, broccoli and plums. A pilaf is a a Middle Eastern dish in which the rice is cooked in a seasoned broth (stock).
